companies.title: Eastern Drayage
companies.subtitle: Some of the projects I worked on while employed at Eastern Drayage:
companies.stack: Projects at Hertz Furniture were built using Python / Django / PHP / Laravel / Node.js / Vue / Ionic (Angular) / PostgreSQL / MySQL / AWS / Docker / Stedi (EDI) / CargoSnap

projects.title: Core Operations Platform Modernization
projects.description: Stabilization and enhancement of a legacy logistics application, reducing crashes, improving reliability, and enabling continued feature development without disrupting daily operations.

projects.title: Unified Inventory Management System
projects.description: A consolidated inventory platform merging multiple disconnected systems into a single source of truth for operational and reporting workflows.

projects.title: EDI Event Processing & Integration Platform
projects.description: An event-driven EDI system using database triggers and Python services to aggregate outbound events, process inbound queues, and automate order entry via the Stedi API.

projects.title: Emergency Data Backup & Resilience System
projects.description: A Python-based emergency backup solution exporting critical operational data to CSV, eliminating reliance on a legacy backup process that degraded application performance.

projects.title: Customer Reporting & Data Export Platform
projects.description: Custom reporting solutions developed in collaboration with customers and account managers, delivering tailored operational and financial data outputs per customer specifications.

projects.title: Driver Mobile Application (PWA)
projects.description: A cross-platform driver application built with Ionic (Angular) for trip reporting, deployed as a Progressive Web App with architecture prepared for future App Store distribution.

projects.title: Driver SMS Automation System
projects.description: An SMS chatbot enabling drivers to report port and terminal in-gate and out-gate activity, reducing manual communication and improving real-time operational visibility.

projects.title: Customer Portal
projects.description: A Vue-based customer portal allowing customers to view shipment status and submit operational updates, powered by a Laravel API and deployed via AWS S3 with automated CI/CD.

projects.title: Multi-Service Laravel API & Admin Platform
projects.description: A central Laravel-based API serving multiple internal and external systems, including customer portals, driver applications, and an internal administrative interface.

projects.title: Document Data Extraction & Processing System
projects.description: A Django API leveraging Google Document AI to extract structured data from customer PDF files, delivering normalized JSON for downstream workflows.

projects.title: Bill of Lading (BOL) Creation Tool
projects.description: A web-based workflow allowing users to review extracted document data and generate flatbed load Bills of Lading by selecting and validating imported line items.

projects.title: Driver Identity & Access Management System
projects.description: An automated driver onboarding system with invitation-based account creation, email-driven password setup, and role-based access control across driver applications.

projects.title: CargoSnap Imaging Integration
projects.description: Implementation and rollout of CargoSnap to standardize container, chassis, and cargo photo documentation, improving accountability, audit trails, and dispute resolution.

projects.title: Yard Information Dashboard & Kiosk System
projects.description: A real-time yard operations dashboard deployed as a kiosk application in warehouse and yard offices to provide operational visibility to staff.

projects.title: Cloud Infrastructure Modernization
projects.description: Migration from legacy servers to AWS-based infrastructure, including RDS, Elastic Beanstalk, PWA hosting, and Dockerized services for production systems.
